articles.description: Nintendo has announced that Pyra and Mythra from Xenoblade Chronicles 2 will be joining Super Smash Bros. Ultimate as the latest DLC characters to be added through the game’s Fighters Pass.
articles.content:
Pyra and Mythra join the fray
Nintendo has announced that Pyra and Mythra from Xenoblade Chronicles 2 will be joining Super Smash Bros. Ultimate, as part of the news from its Nintendo Direct present… [+1419 chars]

articles.title: Bee-themed skins for Yuumi, Malzahar, and Kog'Maw unveiled in League PBE preview - Dot Esports
articles.description: And they're bee-autiful.
articles.content:
Upcoming skins for Yuumi, Malzahar, and Kog’Maw are sure to create a buzz in the League of Legends community.
